column6: Peter comes face-to-face with Mr. Knife! And you won't believe who's behind that snazzy mask. And all this craziness seems to have put a little strain on Peter and Kitty's relationship. You know what'll fix that right up? SPACE DATE! Or rather...SPACE PRISON BREAK! Peter Quill, what a catch.
column8: | writer:Sam Humphries | penciller (cover):Paco Medina | artist:Freddie Willaims
